Emergency Backup Plan

id: careplan2, partOf : CarePlan/careplan1, status:active, intent: plan

description: Weather Emergencies: A shelf stable meal is delivered to Meals On Wheels clients. It is to be eaten in the unlikely event of cancellation. Weather meals are donated by the Sheboygan Service Club.
